bibl.title: The New Testament in Greek. IV: The Gospel According to St. John. I: The Papyri. (New Testament Tools and Studies. 20.)
bibl.note: Introduction. - Abbreviations and Symbols. - Bibliography. - List of the Papyri. - Dates of the Papyri. - The Papyri extant for each Chapter and Overlaps. - Transcriptions. - Apparatus criticus.
ELLIOTT W.J. and D.C. PARKER, The New Testament in Greek. IV: The Gospel According to St. John. I: The Papyri. (New Testament Tools and Studies. 20.)
